name: Don't Eat Those Cookies!
description:
----Don't Eat Those Cookies!----

Controls:

-Arrow keys to move bear

-F to toggle fullscreen

-Esc to pause/unpause

--------------------------------------------------------

Take control of Bobo the bear, who has an out of control addiction to cookies.

Survive 7 Days of a low-cookie diet to ensure Bobo has a healthy future ahead of him!

--------------------------------------------------------

Made with MonoGame for the GMTK2020 48-hour game jam.

This was a solo project that I had a lot of fun making.
